snippet.title: PaperKlay - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description: PaperKlay is a short and sweet 3D platformer where you unfold, open and rotate the paper environment in order to freely explore the cardboard world. Check out this new gameplay trailer to get a glimpse at the game in action.
